rows.label: tlk01000906_msg0001
rows.name:
History is so hard...
It makes me sleepy...

rows.label: tlk01000906_msg0002
rows.name:
Hassane-sensei wants to go to Spirit
Crucible Elpys. If we go for a class
trip, maybe I won't get sleepy.

rows.label: tlk01000906_msg0003
rows.name:
Oh, no no! I'll get in
trouble if I keep talking!

rows.label: tlk01000906_msg0101
rows.name:
We get to salvage in class!
The other day, I pulled up
a Fairy-Tale Belt Pulley!

rows.label: tlk01000906_msg0102
rows.name:
When you salvage something yourself,
everything looks like treasure, but
it's not actually that rare, is it?
